name: Cube Adventure (kunic)
description:
Created for Minijam 54: Memories - Technically had 72 hours to make the game, but only decided to commit to making a game in the last 24 (and the last level kinda shows this, lol).

Game Jam Guidelines: The game must start and end as different genre's. In this game I went with a peaceful puzzle game that transitions into an escape game by the final level.

Controls:

  • Gamepad: Joystick + A Button
  • Keyboard: WASD/Arrow Keys + Spacebar
